alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 8:24PM CDT until June 23 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southeastern Addicks Park Ten, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bellaire, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Downtown Houston, Memorial Park, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Spring Branch North, Fourth Ward, Spring Branch West, Greater Heights, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Valley, Neartown / Montrose, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, Midtown Houston, northeastern Eldridge / West Oaks, Hedwig Village and Hilshire Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
